lead_paragraph: Swedish Orphan Biovitrum, which makes the ReFacto AF treatment for hemophilia for Pfizer, received a preliminary offer from an undisclosed suitor.

headline.main: Sobi, Swedish Maker of Drugs for Rare Diseases, Receives Takeover Bid

snippet: Swedish Orphan Biovitrum, which makes the ReFacto AF treatment for hemophilia for Pfizer, received a preliminary offer from an undisclosed suitor.
abstract: DealBook Online; Swedish Orphan Biovitrum says an unidentified suitor has sent preliminary takeover bid.
